document.full_text: glencore is likely to price its record initial public offering at or above 530p ($8.60), sources close to the matter said, valuing the world's largest commodities trader at a minimum of 36.5 billion pounds ($59 billion).
document.title: glencore set to be priced at $8.60 or above: sources
lines_and_colors: glencore is likely to price its record initial public offering at or above 530p ($8.60), sources close to the matter said, valuing the world's largest commodities trader at a minimum of 36.5 billion pounds ($59 billion).
